data.title: California Dreamin'
data.desc: Discover every city in California

data.title: Sea Dog
data.desc: Deliver cargo to a port in Oakland and a port in San Francisco

data.title: Cheers!
data.desc: Deliver cargo from all 4 vineyards in California

data.title: Warming Up
data.desc: Drive 10,000 miles during deliveries

data.title: Rig Master
data.desc: Buy your own truck

data.title: Company Collector
data.desc: Perform deliveries for at least 15 different companies

data.title: High Five
data.desc: Complete a perfect delivery (no damage, no fines, in-time) for a job that is at least 600 miles

data.title: Cha-Ching
data.desc: Earn $100,000 delivering cargos

data.title: Final Makeover
data.desc: Fully upgrade one of your garages

data.title: Not a Problem
data.desc: Successfully park a trailer at a delivery point

data.title: Like a Boss
data.desc: Successfully park a trailer at a hard delivery point

data.title: I Think I Like It
data.desc: Finish 50 deliveries

data.title: Pimp My Truck
data.desc: Buy and apply a custom paintjob

data.title: What's Your BMI?
data.desc: Use a weigh station

data.title: Gas Guzzler
data.desc: Use a gas station

data.title: Silver State
data.desc: Discover every city in Nevada

data.title: Gold Fever
data.desc: Deliver cargo to both quarries in Nevada

data.title: Copper State
data.desc: Discover every city in Arizona

data.title: Sky Harbor
data.desc: Deliver cargo to the Phoenix Airport

data.title: Start Your Engine!
data.desc: Get on the start of the Truck Racing circuit

data.title: Powell's Trail
data.desc: Visit the Colorado River sights

data.title: Time for Big Hauling
data.desc: Deliver first Heavy Cargo Pack job (requires Heavy Cargo Pack DLC)

data.title: How Heavy Am I?!
data.desc: Use truck scale or weigh station with gross vehicle weight of at least 175,000 lbs (requires Heavy Cargo Pack DLC)

data.title: Heavy, but Not Bull in a China Shop!
data.desc: Complete a perfect delivery (no damage, no fine, in-time) of a cargo from the Heavy Cargo Pack which is at least 1,000 miles long (requires Heavy Cargo Pack DLC)

data.title: Bigger Cargo, Bigger Profit
data.desc: Earn $100,000 on 5 consecutive Heavy Cargo Pack deliveries (requires Heavy Cargo Pack DLC)

data.title: I Thought This Should Be Heavy?!
data.desc: Complete a delivery of all heavy cargoes in American Truck Simulator (requires Heavy Cargo Pack DLC)

data.title: The Land of Enchantment
data.desc: Discover every city in New Mexico (requires New Mexico DLC)

data.title: Truck Stop Tour
data.desc: Visit all large truck stops and rest stops in New Mexico (requires New Mexico DLC)

data.title: Forest Shortcut
data.desc: Discover shortcut through the forest (requires New Mexico DLC)
Drive by the Billy The Kid Museum (requires New Mexico DLC)

data.title: Sky Delivery
data.desc: Deliver cargo to An-124 depot (requires New Mexico DLC)

data.title: Size Matters
data.desc: Successfully deliver a Special Transport DLC mission with no damage and on time (requires Special Transport DLC)

data.title: Go Big or Go Home
data.desc: Complete deliveries on all oversize routes in current map (requires Special Transport DLC)

data.title: Get (to) the Chopper!
data.desc: Successfully deliver a Helicopter Special Transport DLC mission with no damage and on time (requires Special Transport DLC)

data.title: One, Two, Three - Breathe!
data.desc: Successfully deliver an Air Conditioning Complex Special Transport DLC mission with no damage and on time (requires Special Transport DLC)

data.title: Big in America!
data.desc: Make at least 10 unique deliveries of oversize cargoes (requires Special Transport DLC)

data.title: Your Dumper Has Arrived!
data.desc: Deliver all three parts of a disassembled dumper: Haul Truck Hull, Huge Tyres, Haul Truck Chassis (requires Special Transport DLC)

data.title: Home Sweet Home
data.desc: Successfully deliver a Turnkey House Special Transport DLC mission with no damage and on time (requires Special Transport DLC)

data.title: The Beaver State
data.desc: Discover every city in Oregon (requires Oregon DLC)

data.title: Uplifting
data.desc: Travel across the New Youngs Bay Bridge (requires Oregon DLC)

data.title: Lumberjack
data.desc: Deliver cargo from all timber harvest sites in Oregon (requires Oregon DLC)

data.title: Travel Oregon
data.desc: Discover following landmarks of Oregon: Crater Lake, Crooked River Gorge, Thor's Well and Yaquina Head Lighthouse (requires Oregon DLC)

data.title: Cabbage to Cabbage
data.desc: Complete a delivery of vegetables over Cabbage Hill (requires Oregon DLC)

data.title: The Evergreen State
data.desc: Discover every city in Washington (requires Washington DLC)

data.title: Steel Wings
data.desc: Deliver a cargo to an aerospace company in Washington (requires Washington DLC)

data.title: Keep Sailing
data.desc: Deliver a boat to a marina in Washington (requires Washington DLC)

data.title: Terminal Terminus
data.desc: Deliver a cargo to both port terminals in Washington (requires Washington DLC)

data.title: Seattle Mole
data.desc: Drive through both Seattle tunnels (requires Washington DLC)

data.title: Ferry Tales
data.desc: Use a ferry to cross the water (requires Washington DLC)

data.title: Over the Top
data.desc: Drive through the forest road to timber harvest in Bellingham (requires Washington DLC)

data.title: Travel Washington
data.desc: Visit Mount St. Helens, Grand Coulee Dam, Mount Rainier (requires Washington DLC)

data.title: Logged-In
data.desc: Complete delivery of all Forest Machinery DLC cargoes (requires Forest Machinery DLC)

data.title: Leave No Branch Behind!
data.desc: Complete a perfect delivery (no damage, no fines, in-time) of at least 3 Forest Machinery DLC jobs (requires Forest Machinery DLC)

data.title: Beehive State
data.desc: Discover every city in Utah (requires Utah DLC)

data.title: This One Is Mine!
data.desc: Visit all mines & quarries in Utah (requires Utah DLC)

data.title: It's Something
data.desc: Find a sign that says "nothing" (requires Utah DLC)

data.title: Some Like It Salty
data.desc: Take a job from each branch of each company located in Salt Lake City (requires Utah DLC)

data.title: Pump It Up
data.desc: Deliver 5 frac tank trailers to any oil drilling site in Utah (requires Utah DLC)

data.title: Gem State
data.desc: Discover every city in Idaho (requires Idaho DLC)

data.title: Grown in Idaho
data.desc: Complete five deliveries of potatoes from Idaho farms (requires Idaho DLC)

data.title: Along the Snake River
data.desc: Complete perfect deliveries (no damage, no fines, on time) between the following cities: Kennewick - Lewiston; Boise - Twin Falls; Twin Falls - Pocatello; Pocatello - Idaho Falls. Any order or direction counts (requires Washington and Idaho DLCs)

data.title: The Director
data.desc: View cutscenes from all viewpoints in Idaho (requires Idaho DLC)

data.title: 45th Parallel
data.desc: Visit 45th parallel in Idaho - a halfway between the Equator and the North Pole (requires Idaho DLC)

data.title: The Centennial State
data.desc: Discover every city in Colorado (requires Colorado DLC)

data.title: Million Dollar Highway
data.desc: Drive along this famously scenic and thrilling section of the U.S. 550 in Colorado (requires Colorado DLC)

data.title: Cruising High Below
data.desc: Drive through the Eisenhower-Johnson Memorial Tunnel, the highest point on the US Interstate Highway System, in both directions (requires Colorado DLC)

data.title: Energy From Above
data.desc: Deliver a Tower and Nacelle to both Vitas Power wind turbine construction sites in Colorado (requires Colorado DLC)

data.title: Gold Rush
data.desc: Deliver 10 loads to or from the NAMIQ company at the gold mine in Colorado (requires Colorado DLC)

data.title: Up and Away
data.desc: Complete 10 deliveries to Denver Airport (requires Colorado DLC)

data.title: Four Corners
data.desc: Visit the famous Four Corners Monument that marks where the states of Arizona, Colorado, New Mexico, and Utah meet (requires Colorado DLC)

data.title: The Equality State
data.desc: Discover every city in Wyoming (requires Wyoming DLC)

data.title: Over Plains and Mountains
data.desc: View cutscenes from all viewpoints in Wyoming (requires Wyoming DLC)

data.title: Population 1
data.desc: Discover and visit the town of Buford (requires Wyoming DLC)

data.title: Big Boy
data.desc: Deliver Train Axles, Tamping Machine and Rails to or from the rail yard in Cheyenne (requires Wyoming DLC)

data.title: Buffalo Bill
data.desc: Complete 10 perfect cattle deliveries (no damage, no fines, in-time) to livestock auctions in Wyoming (requires Wyoming DLC)

data.title: The Last Best Place
data.desc: Discover every city in Montana (requires Montana DLC)

data.title: Big Sky Country
data.desc: View cutscenes from all viewpoints in Montana (requires Montana DLC)

data.title: Zero Waste
data.desc: Show your support for zero waste by completing a total of 10 deliveries of the Dumpster Bins and Waste Paper cargoes to the Waste Transfer Stations in Montana, and at least one Garbage Truck cargo to or from anywhere in Montana (requires Montana DLC)

data.title: Power On!
data.desc: Spark up Montana and support the power network by delivering a Circuit Breakers cargo and a Utility Poles cargo to the electric substations in each of the following cities: Butte, Glasgow and Havre (requires Montana DLC)

data.title: Major Miner
data.desc: Complete a perfect delivery (no damage, no fines, in-time) of any machinery equipment to the Bull Mountains coal mine, Silane from the silane gas factory and Talc Powder from the talc factory (requires Montana DLC)

data.title: Parking Challenge
data.desc: Complete 20 deliveries choosing the trailer delivery option which requires reversing

data.title: The Lone Star State
data.desc: Discover every city in Texas (requires Texas DLC)

data.title: Big Country Views
data.desc: View cutscenes from at least 25 viewpoints in Texas (requires Texas DLC)

data.title: Avid Historian
data.desc: Discover at least 30 historical markers in Texas (requires Texas DLC)

data.title: Shoreside Delivery
data.desc: Deliver cargo to or from all shipyards and cargo ports in Texas (requires Texas DLC)

data.title: Farm Away
data.desc: Deliver cargo to or from all farms and livestock auctions in Texas (requires Texas DLC)

data.title: Cotton Bloom
data.desc: Complete 10 deliveries of at least one Cotton Lint, Cotton Seed and Cotton Harvester within Texas (requires Texas and Heavy Cargo Pack DLCs)

data.title: The Sooner State
data.desc: Discover every city in Oklahoma (requires Oklahoma DLC)

data.title: Can Do!
data.desc: View cutscenes from all viewpoints in Oklahoma (requires Oklahoma DLC)

data.title: School Bus Capital
data.desc: Deliver 5 Bus Hood cargoes to and 5 School Bus cargoes from the bus factory in Tulsa (requires Oklahoma DLC)

data.title: Big Wheels Keep On Turning
data.desc: Complete 3 deliveries of Big Tyres cargo from both tyre factories in Lawton and Ardmore (requires Oklahoma DLC)

data.title: The Sunflower State
data.desc: Discover every city in Kansas (requires Kansas DLC)

data.title: Wheat State Explorer
data.desc: View cutscenes from all viewpoints in Kansas (requires Kansas DLC)

data.title: Air Capital of the World
data.desc: Deliver an Aircraft Wing and Jet Engine Inlets to or from every aviation depot in Wichita (requires Kansas DLC)

data.title: Can you Keep a Secret?
data.desc: Discover at least 3 unmarked roads in Kansas (requires Kansas DLC)

data.title: Grain of Salt
data.desc: Complete 6 deliveries from the Hutchinson Salt Mine in Kansas. At least 2 deliveries must be to a Food Factory (requires Kansas DLC)

data.title: Cornhusker State
data.desc: Discover every city in Nebraska (requires Nebraska DLC)

data.title: Nebraska Explorer
data.desc: View cutscenes from all viewpoints in Nebraska (requires Nebraska DLC)

data.title: Vehicle Dealer
data.desc: Complete 3 deliveries from the Utility Vehicle Factory in Lincoln to each of the RV dealers in Omaha, Norfolk, and Columbus (requires Nebraska DLC)

data.title: Agriculture Expert
data.desc: Complete one delivery of corn, grain, potatoes and soybean from or within Nebraska (requires Nebraska DLC)

data.title: The Natural State
data.desc: Discover at least 8 cities in Arkansas (requires Arkansas DLC)

data.title: I Saw Arkansas
data.desc: View cutscenes from at least 8 viewpoints in Arkansas (requires Arkansas DLC)

data.title: Paper Trail
data.desc: Complete 3 deliveries of Logs to Chuck & Jack's, and 3 deliveries of Wood Shavings to Page & Price Paper, within Arkansas (requires Arkansas DLC)

data.title: Spa City
data.desc: Complete a delivery to 5 different companies in Hot Springs (requires Arkansas DLC)
